So both paths are equally good. Maybe moving DOWN first is better because it keeps me closer to the wall, but I'm not sure.

Alternatively, I could consider the enemy's position. The enemy is at (6,1), which is far away, so it's not a threat right now. So I can focus on collecting apples.

Another consideration: after collecting the apple at (1,3), my snake will have a body at (0,4) and head at (1,3). Then, if I move to (1,2), my body will follow. So I need to make sure I don't run into myself, but since I'm just starting, it's not an issue yet.

So, to sum up, my options are:
